trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 内のセルの境界線のスタイルが含まれています、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>コントロール。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>コントロールでは、完全に、セルとヘッダーの境界線を含むその外観をカスタマイズすることができます</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>が<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>、および<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>セルの枠線の外観を設定できるプロパティです</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: ただし、さらに罫線をカスタマイズする必要がある場合 DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle クラスを使用するセルのそれぞれの辺に罫線のスタイルを設定します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>、および<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle のプロパティは左、右、上、およびセルの下枠線をそれぞれ表します</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: これらのプロパティを設定することができます、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>セル間の境界線の外観を生成するためにします</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得またはすべてのセルの境界線の境界線スタイルを設定します。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 場合、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>プロパティが同じ<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>値に、すべてのプロパティ値が<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>に設定されていない</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>と</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 1 つ、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>値。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: このプロパティの設定が、無効な場合は、指定した値<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>値。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: このプロパティを設定するときに指定された値が<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: -or- The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref> and this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> instance was retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: - または - 指定した値は、このプロパティの設定時に<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>、または<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>され、この<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>を介して取得されたインスタンス、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティです。

trans-unit.target: 表す文字列、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>です。
